name: Elemental Power
effects: Increase resistance to all elements by 40% for 3 turns to all allies
Increase DEF and SPR by 40% for 3 turns to all allies

name: Elemental Power
元素之力
원소의 힘
Puissance élémentaire
Elementarkraft
Poder elemental
desc_short: Boost DEF, SPR, and fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance for all allies
提高全體隊員防禦精神、火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值
아군 전체의 방어력, 정신력과 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력 상승
Augmente DEF/PSY et rés. feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres pour tous les alliés
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel, alle Verb.
Aumenta DEF, ESP y la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad de todos los aliados
desc_long: Boosts DEF, SPR, and fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance for all allies.
提高全體隊員防禦精神、火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值。
아군 전체의 방어력, 정신력과 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력이 상승합니다.
Augmente DEF/PSY et rés. feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres pour tous les alliés
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel, alle Verb.
Aumenta la DEF, el ESP y la resistencia al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad de todos los aliados.
